channel.title: Error while making Welcome screen
channel.description:
okay.. well i was coding my client with this guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,404620.0.html i also added the thing if you have any errors in your class9.java add this: i all did it. when i finished adding that the errors went from 20 to 7.. well i can't find it please help me. Thanks.
[code]Class9.java:1350: cannot find symbol symbol : method addDTab(int) location: class Class9 Class9 intWscreen = addDTab(17529); ^ Class9.java:1537: cannot find symbol symbol : method loadAscheriitSprite(int,java.lang.String) location: class Class9 dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = loadAscheriitSprite(j, spriteName); ^ Class9.java:1538: cannot find symbol symbol : method loadAscheriitSprite(int,java.lang.String) location: class Class9 dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = loadAscheriitSprite(k, spriteName); ^ Class9.java:1553: cannot find symbol symbol : method CustomSpriteLoader(int,java.lang.String) location: class Class9 class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName); ^ Class9.java:1554: cannot find symbol symbol : method CustomSpriteLoader(int,java.lang.String) location: class Class9 class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName); ^ Class9.java:1570: cannot find symbol symbol : method CustomSpriteLoader(int,java.lang.String) location: class Class9 class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName); ^ Class9.java:1571: cannot find symbol symbol : method CustomSpriteLoader(int,java.lang.String) location: class Class9 class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName); ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 7 errors Finished! Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .[/code]

item.title: Error while making Welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @k1lguy k1lguy
item.description:
@k1lguy wrote:

isn’t it that you must add this:

in class9.java

[code]
public static void addSprite(int i, int j, int k, String spriteName)
{
Class9 dSprite = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
dSprite.anInt250 = i;
dSprite.anInt236 = i;
dSprite.anInt262 = 5;
dSprite.anInt217 = 1;
dSprite.anInt214 = 0;
dSprite.anInt220 = 20;
dSprite.anInt267 = 20;
dSprite.aByte254 = 0;
dSprite.anInt230 = 52;
dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = loadAscheriitSprite(j, spriteName);
dSprite.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = loadAscheriitSprite(k, spriteName);
}

public static void addCloseButton(int i, String spriteName, int width, int height, String s)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 1;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = width;
class9.anInt267 = height;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = 52;
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aString221 = s;
}

public static void addActionButton(int i, int width, int height, String s, String spriteName)
{
Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9();
class9.anInt250 = i;
class9.anInt236 = i;
class9.anInt262 = 5;
class9.anInt217 = 1;
class9.anInt214 = 0;
class9.anInt220 = width;
class9.anInt267 = height;
class9.aByte254 = 0;
class9.anInt230 = 52;
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(0, spriteName);
class9.aString221 = s;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Error while making Welcome screen
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

Declare this in your class9:

public static Class9 addDTab(int i) { Class9 class9 = aClass9Array210[i] = new Class9(); class9.anInt250 = i; class9.anInt236 = i; class9.anInt262 = 0; class9.anInt217 = 0; class9.anInt214 = 0; class9.anInt220 = 512; class9.anInt267 = 334; class9.aByte254 = 0; class9.anInt230 = 0; return class9; }
I think that should work.

Read full topic
